attributes.action: Call a general election now! Get this labour government removed from office
attributes.additional_details: Because this government has not delivered on any of it’s promises also it’s mandates have time and time again have been lies
attributes.background: Remove labour especially kier Starmer from governing our country

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Dissolve Parliament and call a General Election now!
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/750050
